skillTree.localised_description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
The Handmaiden's actions have gleaned the favour of the Earth Goddess.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: As an envoy of Alarielle, the Handmaiden speaks with the authority of the Everqueen.
In a culture where words can cut as deeply as blades, a tactful speech can stop conflicts and waylay wars.
Not all intentions need be hidden behind words and poetry; sometimes, good diplomacy is direct diplomacy.
A secret kept is a favour to be returned at a later time.
One of the Everqueen's inner circle; highly trusted, they will gladly die for the Everqueen if called upon to do so.
Handmaidens, like many Elves, excel at missile weapons, but this one's eye is especially keen.
A mistress of the bow, able to loose an arrow before a man can complete a blink.
The eyes of the hawk, able to pluck a falling hair with a deft arrow sent from her bow.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Hawkish Precision" for Archers, Lothern Seaguard, Shadow-walkers, Shadow Warriors, and Sister of Avelorn units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.localised_description: To protect and guard the Everqueen is an eternal honour and one that no Handmaiden has ever refused.
Do not mistake the title of Handmaiden as a serf, for they are warriors all, and incredibly powerful ones at that.
As a guardian, the Warrioress is sworn to protect everything that Asur hold dear.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Sisters under the command of this handmaiden move with a shocking quickness.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The quivers of the Sisters under the command of this handmaiden seem unnaturally full.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ensorceled weaponry isn't a simple requisition...

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The honor of serving under the command of this handmaiden is all the payment required.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their spear; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Avelorn's shield protects its forests and queen, and is blessed with preternatural grace.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one is something of an eccentric; their erratic behaviour has upset powerful people, which is seldom a good idea.

effects.description:
Upkeep: +20% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Don't take this one along if you need to get away quickly… or maybe you should…
Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.
Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Stiff, starched, formal. Inflexible.
Good ideas oft-times need vocal, public support to turn them into reality.
Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.
Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.
I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands.
If there's a right way to do something, this one doesn't have the wherewithal to know what it is.

effects.description:
Melee attack: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some things should not have to be endured.
On occasion, throwing the whole nine leagues at the enemy is just the ticket.
Skills refined and improved upon over time can only increase one's edge over the foe.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers and Silver Helms units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers and Silver Helms units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Unit experience gain: +25% for Sisters of Avelorn
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.
This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hmmm interesting. I do wonder if there's a third way, however…
The Daemon is very definitely in the detail…
This one acts not for themselves but the for the greater good, in defence of the future.
This one doesn't even relax in their own company, so reserved is their nature.
You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!
Impressively energetic for a thousand years old - even by their own reckoning.
There's usually a right way and a wrong way to do anything. This one generally gets it wrong.
This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: +10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd be… Oh wait...

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +3%
	(own characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There's always a way - always an angle. You just have to find it.
An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for infantry units
	(Hero's army)
